name: Eventyret
overview: A Danish text adventure with graphics created by Frans Kappel Øvre and released in 1986. The author translated the game into English but never published it due to low sales of this game. In this text adventure you can carry up to 8 items so make them count. Type bagage to see your inventory. Your goal is to throw the ring of power into the volcano and destroy it and free the world from evil power.
